mapper.select:
select lessontraining.student.student_id,lessontraining.student.student_name, lessontraining.student.age,lessontraining.student.sex,lessontraining.student.school, lessontraining.student.address,lessontraining.studentclass.studentclassName, lessontraining.college.collegeName,lessontraining.student.studentClassId from lessontraining.student,lessontraining.studentclass,lessontraining.college where lessontraining.studentclass.id = lessontraining.student.studentClassId and lessontraining.studentclass.collegeId = lessontraining.college.id
and age = ${paging.map.get('age')}
and student_name like concat('%',${paging.map.get('name')},'%')
and lessontraining.college.collegeName like concat('%','${paging.map.get("collegeName")}','%')
and studentclassName like concat('%','${paging.map.get("clazzName")}','%')
order by student_id
order by age
order by sex
limit ${(paging.pageNum-1)*paging.pageSize},${paging.pageSize};
